I'm a Software Developer at Fraunhofer MeVis and a 3rd year PhD student in the VCGL Research Group at Jacobs University Bremen, under supervision of Prof. Dr. Lars Linsen.

My research and work mainly focus on Computer Graphics and Image Processing. My focus languages are C++ and Directx.
